name: Irish Grain & Feed Association
membership: EM Feed Manufacturers  Association ( FEFAC ) http://www.fefac.eu/
goal:
Promote the Interest of the Irish Feed Industry ( compunders, importers of feed materials & premix companies to the Irish and EU Institutions.

Ensure continued access to feed materials by lobbying for and promoting well functioning regulatory systems in relation to market access and phytosanitary issues .

promote and encourage best practice systems among members for the production of safe feed.
Represent the Irish feed industry on Irish and EU funded research projects.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Medicated Feed & VMP proposal
RED 11

Commission action plan on AMR

Road map on TSE and re - authorizations under 999/2001

CAP issues.

Pesticides and MRL dossiers
CAP , Protein Plan
Biofulels , Bioeconomy
